DOC.brief_summary: The purpose K.I.S.S . study evaluate efficacy Kinerase® Cream ( Kinetin 0.1 % ) Thai patient , basis severity clinical sign facial photodamage .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Kinerase® Treatment Cutaneous Facial Photodamage
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject older 35 year age less 65 year age . 2 . Subjects mild , moderate severe facial photodamage assess 10point scale . 3 . Subjects willing sign inform consent adhere protocol requirement . 1 . Male female subject suspect porphyria , systemic cutaneous erythematosus lupus , photosensitize disorder druginduced photosensitization . 2 . Subjects chronic recur skin disease disorder . 3 . Subjects active infectious skin disorder ( Herpes simplex , molluscum contagiosum , facial wart ) . 4 . Subjects skin cancer facial tissue . 5 . Subjects receive laser/ intense pulse light ( IPL ) / chemical peel 2 month precede screen visit . 6 . Subjects history topical and/or oral isotretinoin use , 6 month prior screen visit . 7 . Subjects topical RetinA Renova 2 month prior screen visit . 8 . Subjects use topical alphahydroxy acid skin care product month precede screen visit . 9 . Subjects currently antiaging product wish continue use product . 10 . Subjects require concurrent treatment would interfere study assessment . 11 . Pregnant lactate female subject .
